# 组件













import ToggleTheme from '../components/toggle-theme.tsx'

## LinkButton

链接按钮组件，用于链接 URL 并显示文本。

```mdx
<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />
```

<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />

## ThemeImage

图片组件，用于在亮色和暗色模式下显示不同的图片。

```mdx
<ThemeImage light="../images/sun.svg" dark="../images/moon.svg" className="w-10" />
```

点击 <ToggleTheme /> 切换主题，图标会随之变化。

<ThemeImage light={ThemeImage_light_0.src} dark={ThemeImage_dark_1.src} className="w-10" />

## CodeBlock

代码块组件，用于显示代码块。

{/* prettier-ignore */}

```mdx
<CodeBlock lang="tsx" code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
    return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`} />
```

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`}
/>

与下面的代码块相同：

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}
\`\`\``}
/>

## ViewCode

既能渲染指定组件也能查看其源代码的组件。

```mdx
<ViewCode src="../components/demo.tsx" />
```

<ViewCode component={<ViewCodeActualComponent0 />} code={ViewCodeComponentSourceCode1} />

或者使用 `view-code` 关键字来注入到代码块中：

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx view-code
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className="border-4 border-solid rounded p-2">
      This is a Foo 
      <div className='border-4 border-solid rounded p-2'>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
\`\`\``}
/>

{/* prettier-ignore */}

<ViewCode
  code="'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
      This is a Foo
      <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}"
  component={<ViewCodeTempComponent2 />}
/>


# Components













import ToggleTheme from '../components/toggle-theme.tsx'

## LinkButton

A link button component to link url and show text.

```mdx
<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />
```

<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />

## ThemeImage

A image component to show different image in light and dark mode.

```mdx
<ThemeImage light="../images/sun.svg" dark="../images/moon.svg" className="w-10" />
```

click <ToggleTheme /> to toggle theme and the icon will change.

<ThemeImage light={ThemeImage_light_0.src} dark={ThemeImage_dark_1.src} className="w-10" />

## CodeBlock

A component to show code block.

{/* prettier-ignore */}

```mdx
<CodeBlock lang="tsx" code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
    return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`} />
```

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`}
/>

It's the same as:

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}
\`\`\``}
/>

## ViewCode

A component to view code.

```mdx
<ViewCode src="../components/demo.tsx" />
```

<ViewCode component={<ViewCodeActualComponent0 />} code={ViewCodeComponentSourceCode1} />

or use `view-code` keyword to inject the code block.

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx view-code
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className="border-4 border-solid rounded p-2">
      This is a Foo
      <div className='border-4 border-solid rounded p-2'>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
\`\`\``}
/>

{/* prettier-ignore */}

<ViewCode
  code="'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
      This is a Foo
      <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}"
  component={<ViewCodeTempComponent2 />}
/>


# 组件













import ToggleTheme from '../components/toggle-theme.tsx'

## LinkButton

链接按钮组件，用于链接 URL 并显示文本。

```mdx
<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />
```

<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />

## ThemeImage

图片组件，用于在亮色和暗色模式下显示不同的图片。

```mdx
<ThemeImage light="../images/sun.svg" dark="../images/moon.svg" className="w-10" />
```

点击 <ToggleTheme /> 切换主题，图标会随之变化。

<ThemeImage light={ThemeImage_light_0.src} dark={ThemeImage_dark_1.src} className="w-10" />

## CodeBlock

代码块组件，用于显示代码块。

{/* prettier-ignore */}

```mdx
<CodeBlock lang="tsx" code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
    return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`} />
```

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`}
/>

与下面的代码块相同：

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}
\`\`\``}
/>

## ViewCode

既能渲染指定组件也能查看其源代码的组件。

```mdx
<ViewCode src="../components/demo.tsx" />
```

<ViewCode component={<ViewCodeActualComponent0 />} code={ViewCodeComponentSourceCode1} />

或者使用 `view-code` 关键字来注入到代码块中：

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx view-code
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className="border-4 border-solid rounded p-2">
      This is a Foo 
      <div className='border-4 border-solid rounded p-2'>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
\`\`\``}
/>

{/* prettier-ignore */}

<ViewCode
  code="'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
      This is a Foo
      <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}"
  component={<ViewCodeTempComponent2 />}
/>


# Components













import ToggleTheme from '../components/toggle-theme.tsx'

## LinkButton

A link button component to link url and show text.

```mdx
<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />
```

<LinkButton url="https://github.com/showlotus/fumadocs-template" text="Github" />

## ThemeImage

A image component to show different image in light and dark mode.

```mdx
<ThemeImage light="../images/sun.svg" dark="../images/moon.svg" className="w-10" />
```

click <ToggleTheme /> to toggle theme and the icon will change.

<ThemeImage light={ThemeImage_light_0.src} dark={ThemeImage_dark_1.src} className="w-10" />

## CodeBlock

A component to show code block.

{/* prettier-ignore */}

```mdx
<CodeBlock lang="tsx" code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
    return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`} />
```

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}`}
/>

It's the same as:

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return <div>This is a Foo with <Demo /></div>
}
\`\`\``}
/>

## ViewCode

A component to view code.

```mdx
<ViewCode src="../components/demo.tsx" />
```

<ViewCode component={<ViewCodeActualComponent0 />} code={ViewCodeComponentSourceCode1} />

or use `view-code` keyword to inject the code block.

<CodeBlock
  lang="tsx"
  code={`\`\`\`mdx view-code
'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className="border-4 border-solid rounded p-2">
      This is a Foo
      <div className='border-4 border-solid rounded p-2'>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
\`\`\``}
/>

{/* prettier-ignore */}

<ViewCode
  code="'use client'

import Demo from '../components/demo.tsx'

export default function Foo() {
  return (
    <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
      This is a Foo
      <div className=&#x22;border-4 border-solid rounded p-2&#x22;>
        <Demo />
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}"
  component={<ViewCodeTempComponent2 />}
/>
